1.1.0.en: Autodiscovery has been added to make pairing easier. Also an action card for setting your Twinkly lights to a solid color has been added as extra functionality.

1.1.1.en: Added an action card for switching demo mode on or off.

3.0.0.en: Update to SDK3 (require Homey firmware 5.x) and some minor improvements.

3.0.2.en: Update to SDK3 (require Homey firmware 5.x) and some minor improvements.
